resources.string:
E-Mail: info@loavesfishescomputer.org 
 
 Click the icons below to 
 perform desired activity
Loaves, Fishes, and Computers Inc. is not responsible for any data lost or damages of any kind from using this application.

The primary mission of Loaves, Fishes and Computers, Inc. is to provide computer technologies, knowledge and assistance to those who cannot otherwise afford them, primarily low-income families, students, the disadvantaged, the elderly, and the disabled. 
 
 By keeping computers out of the landfill, LFC promotes environmental stewardship, simultaneously providing a place for volunteers to learn, share and help their community. 
 
 E-mail us at info@loavesfishescomputers.org
You\'ll find us at: \n 348 Roberts Ave \n Seaside, CA, 93955

La mision principal de Loaves, Fishes and Computers, Inc. es proveer computadoras, conocimiento y asistencia técnica a aquellos quienes de alguna manera no pueden permitirse estos servicios, primordialmente familias de bajos ingresos, estudiantes, los menos afortunados, aquellos de la tercera edad y discapacitados. 
 
 Manteniendo computadoras fuera de nuestro ecosistema, LFC promueve la protección del medio ambiente, simultáneamente proporcionando un lugar a voluntarios para aprender, compartir y ayudar a su comunidad. 
 
 Enviar email a: info@loavesfishescomputers.org
E-Mail: info@loavesfishescomputer.org \n \nHaga clic en los iconos debajo de realizar la actividad deseada
Usted nos encontrará en: \n 348 Roberts Ave \n Seaside, CA, 93955
